drug.name: Hydroquinidine
drug.description: Hydroquinidine is under investigation in clinical trial NCT00927732 (Hydroquinidine Versus Placebo in Patients With Brugada Syndrome).

drug-interaction.description: Amiodarone may increase the QTc-prolonging activities of Hydroquinidine.
